name: Bullet Hack
description:
Fight your way through waves of enemies in this roguelike top-down shooter.

Explore around to find upgrades and defeat 5 unique bosses.

This game was made as a final year project for our degree in game design.

The team:

- Bissol Kenny : Game Design / VFX

- Guilloux Teiki : Programming

- Lemaire Ariiura : 2D Sprites / Visual Design

- Atchoy Ned : Environement Artist

- Meyer Michael : SFX / Music
